---

### `GET` /api/attestations

HandleCreateAttestation accepts a browser-created attestation and stores it server-side.
POST /api/attestations — idempotent (returns 200 if already exists).

**Handler**: `HandleCreateAttestation`

---

**Handler**: `canvasHandler`

**Handler**: `canvasHandler`

**Handler**: `canvasHandler`

### `GET` /api/canvas/glyphs/

**Handler**: `canvasHandler`

### `GET` /api/types

**Handler**: `HandleTypes`

---

### `GET` /api/types/

HandleTypes handles type attestation operations:
GET /api/types - List all type attestations
POST /api/types - Create or update a type attestation
GET /api/types/{typename} - Get a specific type attestation

**Handler**: `HandleTypes`

---

### `GET` /api/watchers

**Handler**: `HandleWatchers`

---

### `GET` /api/watchers/

HandleWatchers handles watcher CRUD operations
Routes:
  GET    /api/watchers       - List all watchers
  POST   /api/watchers       - Create a new watcher
  GET    /api/watchers/{id}  - Get a watcher by ID
  PUT    /api/watchers/{id}  - Update a watcher
  DELETE /api/watchers/{id}  - Delete a watcher

**Handler**: `HandleWatchers`
